lom:description.lom:string: This report by associate professor at Worcester State College descries a survey about the attitudes towards computers, with special interest in "Are there differences in the male-female composition of introductory and advanced courses? Are there differences between men and women in their attitudes toward computers, and, if such differnces do exist, how are they related to male-female enrollment ratios in computer science courses?"

lom:keyword.lom:string: Gender Equity, Woman and information technology

lom:title.lom:string: A Comparison of Male and Female Computer Science Students' Attitudes Toward Computers
